translations: n．卜辞，占卜：通过神秘的方法预测未来或解释隐藏的知识。
· Ancient people often relied on divinations to make important decisions.
古代人们经常依赖卜辞来做重要决策。

sentences.sentence: Lo! I have completed my divinations.
sentences.translation: 瞧！我已经完成了这个预言法术了。

sentences.sentence: Its theurgy was able to do exact and efficacious divinations for seventy-two times but it couldn't prophesy the king would open its belly and killed him.
sentences.translation: 牠的神通能帮宋元君预卜先知，连续七十二次没有失误，却算不到自己被宋元君开肠破肚的杀害。
